Member Function Documentation

bool mimas::Path::contains ( float  x,
float  y 
) [inline]

Return true if the *shape* contains the given point. This is a test against a surface. To test intersection with a line, use 'outlineForWidth' first.

Definition at line 78 of file Path.h.

Path mimas::Path::outlineForWidth ( float  width) [inline]

Return a new path that corresponds to the outline of the current path (takes a curve, returns a surface). This new path can be used to check intersection for example.
